mapper.select: /* HakwonDAO.hakwonCateList */ select a.cate_code as cateCode , a.cate_name as cateName , a.cate_order as cateOrder from tb_hakwon_cate a order by a.cate_order asc

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonDetail */ select a.hakwon_code , a.master_user_no , d.user_name as master_user_name , a.hakwon_no , a.hakwon_cate , get_cate_name(a.hakwon_cate) as hakwon_cate_name , b.hakwon_name , b.tel_no_1 , b.tel_no_2 , b.logo_file_no , b.introduction , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path , c.addr_no , c.old_sido , c.old_addr1 , c.old_addr2 , c.street_addr1 , c.street_addr2 from tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info b , tb_hakwon_address c , tb_user_info d where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.hakwon_status = '001' and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no and b.hakwon_no = c.hakwon_no and a.master_user_no = d.user_no

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonSimpleDetail */ select a.hakwon_code , a.master_user_no , a.hakwon_no , a.hakwon_cate , get_cate_name(a.hakwon_cate) as hakwon_cate_name , b.hakwon_name , b.tel_no_1 , b.tel_no_2 , b.logo_file_no , b.introduction , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path from tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info b where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.hakwon_status = '001' and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no

/* HakwonDAO.classSimpleDetail */ select x.class_no , x.class_title , a.hakwon_code , a.master_user_no , a.hakwon_no , a.hakwon_cate , get_cate_name(a.hakwon_cate) as hakwon_cate_name , b.hakwon_name , b.tel_no_1 , b.tel_no_2 , b.logo_file_no , b.introduction , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path from tb_hakwon_class x , tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info b where x.class_no = #{class_no} and x.hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and a.hakwon_status = '001' and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonUserCount */ select (select count(1) from tb_hakwon_teacher where hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and approved_yn = 'Y' ) teacher_count , (select count(1) from tb_hakwon_member where hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and user_type = '006' ) student_count , (select count(1) from tb_hakwon_member where hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and user_type = '005' ) parents_count

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonClassDetail */ select a.class_no , a.class_order , a.class_title , a.class_intro , a.logo_file_no , get_file_path(a.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y%m%d') as reg_date from tb_hakwon_class a where a.class_no = #{class_no}

/* HakwonDAO.classTeacherList*/ select a.hakwon_no , a.class_no , a.teacher_user_no , b.subject , c.user_name , c.user_gender , c.tel1_no , calc_age(c.user_birthday) as age , c.photo_file_no , get_file_path(c.photo_file_no) as photo_file_path from tb_hakwon_class_teacher a , tb_hakwon_teacher b , tb_user_info c where a.class_no = #{class_no} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no and a.teacher_user_no = b.user_no and b.approved_yn = 'Y' and a.teacher_user_no = c.user_no order by c.user_name asc
limit #{start_no}, #{page_scale}

/* HakwonDAO.classTeacherListTotCount*/ select count(1) from tb_hakwon_class_teacher a , tb_hakwon_teacher b , tb_user_info c where a.class_no = #{class_no} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no and a.teacher_user_no = b.user_no and b.approved_yn = 'Y' and a.teacher_user_no = c.user_no

/* HakwonDAO.userHakwonList */ select b.hakwon_name , b.hakwon_no , get_file_path(c.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path , (select group_concat(y.class_title SEPARATOR '/') from tb_hakwon_class_student x, tb_hakwon_class y where x.hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and x.student_user_no = a.user_no and x.class_no = y.class_no) as class_name , d.old_sido , (select cate_name from tb_hakwon_cate where cate_code = b.hakwon_cate) as hakwon_cate_name from tb_hakwon_member a , tb_hakwon b , tb_hakwon_info c , tb_hakwon_address d where a.user_no = #{user_no} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no and b.hakwon_status = '001' and a.hakwon_no = c.hakwon_no and a.hakwon_no = d.hakwon_no

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonUserClassList */ select a.class_no , b.class_title , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path from tb_hakwon_class_student a , tb_hakwon_class b where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.student_user_no = #{student_user_no} and a.class_no = b.class_no order by b.class_order asc
/* HakwonDAO.noticeCateList */ select a.cate_name from tb_notice_cate a where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} order by a.cate_order asc

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonClassListAll */ select b.class_no , b.class_order , b.class_title , b.logo_file_no , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path from tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_class b where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.master_user_no = #{user_no} and b.hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no order by b.class_title asc

/* HakwonDAO.hakwonSearchList */ select a.hakwon_no , a.hakwon_name , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path , a.hakwon_code , get_user_name(a.master_user_no) as master_user_name from tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info b where a.hakwon_name like concat('%', #{search_text}, '%') and a.hakwon_no <> #{hakwon_no} and a.hakwon_status = '001' and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no order by a.hakwon_name asc limit 50
